description.value: When triggered, this wrist launcher ammunition fires a volley of energy flechette rounds in a short line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide or a long line 45 feet long and 5 feet wide. A single flechette clip holds enough ammunition for three attacks in a short line or one attack in a long line. Each creature must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes [[/r 1d10]] energy damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one. If you lack proficiency in the wrist launcher, you have disadvantage on damage rolls with it
